Display

Used by the extension to handle the rendering of overlays and events to the browser viewport.

Summary
Display
Used by the extension to handle the rendering of overlays and events to the browser viewport.
Functions
Display
Initializes the object
init
update
This method takes the contents of the obj parameter and determines if it should render to the DOM or a XUL panel.
create_xul_overlay
This function will create a xul overlay for the page object.

Functions

Display

Display = function(tab)

Initializes the object

Parameters

tabAn Instance of a Tab class.

init

Display.prototype.init = function()

update

Display.prototype.update = function(obj)

This method takes the contents of the obj parameter and determines if it should render to the DOM or a XUL panel.

Parameters

objAn instance of either a <SpecialEffect>, <HudWindow>, or <Message>.

create_xul_overlay

Display.prototype.create_xul_overlay = function(record)

This function will create a xul overlay for the page object.

parameters

recordthe data to display in the xul overlay.

This class inject Pmog featurees into the Firefox tab.
